scripts.build: esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=abc.mjs --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as createRequire99 } from 'module'; import { dirname as dirname99 } from 'node:path'; import { fileURLToPath as fileURLToPath99 } from 'node:url'; const __filename = fileURLToPath99(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname99(__filename); const require = createRequire99(import.meta.url);"
